article.title: Bulgarian
article.paragraph: wiktionaryBulgarianrefers to anything of or relating toBulgariaand may refer directly to:

list.listitem: A citizen of Bulgaria. See alsoDemographics of BulgariaandCulture of Bulgaria. For specific Bulgarians, seeList of Bulgarians.
Bulgars, ancient people, part of the ancestors of the Bulgarians
Bulgar language, an extinct Turkic language.
